data.prayer: God, we pray for the believers in Arica y Parinacota, Chile to be generous so that they would be worthy of greater investment by you.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Arica y Parinacota, Chile
data.section_summary: What beauty can God be thanked for in this photo?

data.prayer: Pour your Spirit out on the 213,600 citizens of Arica y Parinacota, Chile, so that they might know your name and the name of your Son.
data.verse: And afterward, I will pour out my Spirit on all people. your sons and daughters will prophesy, your old men will dream dreams, your young men will see visions.

data.prayer: Spirit, help the 49,172 believers find a person of peace today among the 164,427 lost neighbors around them. And help them start discovery bible studies in these unbelieving homes.
data.verse: Suddenly a man in shining clothes stood before me and said, ‘Cornelius, God has heard your prayer and remembered your gifts to the poor. Send to Joppa for Simon who is called Peter. He is a guest in the home of Simon the tanner, who lives by the sea.’ So I sent for you immediately, and it was good of you to come. Now we are all here in the presence of God to listen to everything the Lord has commanded you to tell us.”

data.prayer: Spirit, teach the 49,172 believers in Arica y Parinacota that when they seek first your Kingdom and your righteousness, you will abundantly provide all they need.
data.verse: And God is able to bless you abundantly, so that in all things at all times, having all that you need, you will abound in every good work.

data.prayer: Father, I pray against the principalities, against the powers, against the world’s rulers of darkness of this age, and against the spiritual forces of the wickedness in the heavenly places that are warring against the Pashtun, Northern people.
Spirit, help the fearful in Arica y Parinacota, Chile to submit to God and resist the devil.
data.verse: Submit yourselves, then, to God. Resist the devil, and he will flee from you.

data.prayer: Father, we agree with your desire that the people in the state of Arica y Parinacota hear about you.
data.verse: "Those who were not told about him will see, and those who have not heard will understand."

data.section_summary:
the state of Arica y Parinacota, Chile has a population of 213,600.

We estimate Arica y Parinacota has 49,172 people who might know Jesus, 136,941 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 27,486 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 4 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, put the people who are lonely into families in the state of Arica y Parinacota.
data.verse: God sets the lonely in families. He brings out the prisoners with singing, but the rebellious dwell in a sun-scorched land.
